attributes.review: So I downloaded this app because my daughter had been a fan of him for so long, however, the moment I downloaded the app, it warned me of age restricted content. I wasnâ€™t sure what explicit age content there was considering it was just going to talk about his political agenda for the upcoming presidential term. I opened the app to make sure it wasnâ€™t ACTUAL explicit images. The moment I opened it, I was introduced to Mr. Trump literally half-naked wearing an American flag speedo. I want to tell you that I was joking but I am not.  I was appalled to see our president wearing such provocative attire. I deleted the app for the sake of my child and questioned whether supporting him was any good. I now have to attend therapy biweekly to deal with the trauma. Please. Do not download the app.

attributes.review: When I got the app, I was a hardcore â€œAll Lives Matterâ€ type of person. I cared about womenâ€™s reproductive rights, the LGBTQ+ community, immigrants, minority groups, and many more things. I wanted equal pay among all genders, abortion to a legal option for women who need/want it, and most of all, basic equal rights among everyone, no matter what. Being that this man was running for President, I thought that he would care about these things as much as I do. He did, but not in the way I thought. Every time this man talked, all I would hear are racist remarks, degrading words, and overall stupid facts that he claims are true, but really arenâ€™t. Iâ€™m just saying that if you are going to have your own app, have the correct information that spreads positivity.
attributes.title: Terrible App

attributes.review: i downloaded this app thinking it would help me support the current (non racist, non bigoted, non homophobic, non Islamphobic, non facist, etc) president of the united states by giving me updates of his upcoming rallies and events etc, but the app completely hacked my phone by loading mortifying pictures all over my screen. the app deleted all my data and all my photos and everything i had saved on my phone with no way to retrieve them. the app kept loading pornogrpahic images onto my screen and i am still in complete shock. this app must immediately be removed from the app store. this foolery is not what i was expecting from the president of the USA and you shall no longer expect my vote in the upcoming election later this year.
